attributes.action: Request the LOCOG to revert to the original "river" logo for the 2012 Games, as the new logo is an embarrassment to the nation.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The London 2012 Olympics logo was unveiled on 4 June to widespread derision. It is an embarrassment to the country and a complete waste of money. The Organising Committee should be forced to revert to the original "river" logo, which was elegant, classy and referenced the host city.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
